page.title: 19Industry in the Camp Area
page.content: We found 37 industries in the Camp area. There are 2 small industrial parks and individual businesses. 3 car spares manufacturers 3 engineering firms 3 printers 2 book binders 2 chemical firms 2 removal and storage firms 1 medical instrument manufacturer 1 delivery firm 1 paper merchant 1 lighting firm 1 photo lithography firm 1 kitchen equipment manufacturer 1 dental laboratory 1 stove enamelling firm 1 electronics firm 1 supplier to the licensed trade 1 radiator services firm 1 double glazing firm (Continued on Page 20)
